column1:
Accused  Appellant  was 
indicted 
in 
the  High  Court  of  Anuradhapura

for 
the  murder  of  one  Kandepitawaththe  Gedara  Lal  Sisira  Kumara.

After 
trial,  he  has  pleaded  guilty 
for 
the 
lesser  offence  which

is  under  Section 
297 
of 
the  Penal  Code, 
culpable  homicide 
not

He  was 
sentenced 
to  8  years  Rigorous 
Imprisonment  and 
a 
fine  of

Rs. 
SOOO/-with 
a  default 
term  of 
3  months 
and  also  he  has  been

ordered 
to  pay  Rs. 
200,000/-
as 
compensation 
to 
the 
family  of

the  deceased  with  a  default 
term  of  2  years.

Counsel 
for 
the 
Appellant 
informs 
court 
that 
he 
is 
only

canvassing 
the 
sentence 
and 
not 
the 
conviction 
since 
the
appellant  has  pleaded  guilty  in  the  High  Court.

Considering 
the 
submissions  made 
and 
the  evidence  given 
in 
this
